domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse President Pine-Sol failed on Coronavirus. Multiple times. Stop trying 2 blame everything & everyone for your failures. You lied, you dragged your heels, u lied, you couldn't put together a plan or strategy, u lied, u proved that you don't give a shit about Americans, you lied.
